jug.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a container with a wide curved opening at the top and a handle, used especially at meals for pouring liquids
jug.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a deep round container with a very narrow opening at the top and a handle, used for holding liquids
jug.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: the amount of liquid that a jug will hold
